title.rendered: Are you looking for luxury; let’s do it Gulshan style

content.rendered:
If you have been dreaming of your own house for a while now, why not wait for something that spells and opulence but comes at affordable prices! When we talk about luxury homes, a name that instantly comes to mind is Gulshan. Our real estate brand has proven time and again that we are the frontrunners in making the term luxury homes synonymous with our trusted brand.

# Awards and Recognitions

The various awards and accolades received by us are testimony to the fact that Gulshan has given new heights to luxury housing. Our past projects and recommendations given by satisfied homeowners speak volumes about our commitment to quality and adherence to timelines in our quest to give people their dream luxury homes.

Listed below are some milestones that have sealed our position in the real industry:

● Gulshan received an award from IRA 2015 for the best luxury developer. This award was given by the Chairman of FTII
● Gulshan was recognized as the best CSR Developer of the year at the Realty And More Property Awards
● Our project Gulshan Vivante was given the award for the best residential project of the year
● At the India International property awards, Gulshan received the Realty Plus Conclave and excellence award

Gulshan has been a name associated with luxury housing for over two decades now. A real estate company that started with the construction of independent houses, we moved onto building multiple housing projects in the Delhi-NCR region and are now one of the top builders of Noida. Our name is not just associated with luxury homes but with utmost trust owing to our prime focus on on-time delivery of projects.

With more and more homeowners wishing to buy a luxury home, it has always been our endeavor to give them the best quality whether it is in terms of architecture, design, layout, pricing, or customer service. Gulshan works with the best in the field of architecture and interiors to deliver world-class homes that go beyond the expectations of our clients. With our projects Gulshan Ikebana and Gulshan Vivante, we have delivered homes that reflect a melange of opulence, style, and comfort.

# Upcoming Luxury projects

● Gulshan Botnia

Gulshan Botnia, which is our upcoming project, offers luxury Homes that not just give you the amenities of modern-day living but also a complete luxury experience. An open badminton court, beauty salon, AC gymnasium, jogging tracks, immaculate landscaping, and foolproof 24*7 security are some of the features of these luxury homes.

When you are looking for a home that speaks the language of style, Gulshan is what you are looking for.
